description: This file defines the AppScaffold widget, which implements the main scaffold of the app with bottom navigation and floating action buttons for quick actions on specific tabs.

classes.name: AppScaffold
classes.description: A stateless widget that provides a main scaffold with bottom navigation bar and conditionally shows FABs for adding new events or birthdays.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree including AppBar, body with IndexedStack of pages, bottom navigation bar, and conditionally displays FAB.

methods.name: _buildFab
methods.description: Determines and returns the appropriate FloatingActionButton based on the current tab index, for quick actions.
